title: Record Store Day 2026: A Survival Guide
description: Everything you need to know for RSD 2026 on 18 April — the releases worth chasing, how early to queue, and what to do if you miss out.

title: Behind the Sample: How Labi Siffre Made Eminem's Career (Then Made Him Change the Lyrics)
description: The story of Labi Siffre's 'I Got The…', the 1975 funk track that became the backbone of 'My Name Is', and the principled stand that almost stopped it happening.
heroAlt: Remember My Song by Labi Siffre

title: Country Music Is Taking Over the UK — and These Are the Artists You Need on Vinyl
description: From Zach Bryan selling out Tottenham to Tyler Childers and a wave of new talent, country is having its biggest UK moment ever. Here's who to watch and what to spin.
heroAlt: With Heaven on Top by Zach Bryan — vinyl album cover

title: The Best-Selling Vinyl Records in the UK in 2025
description: Taylor Swift, Sam Fender and Oasis led the charge as UK vinyl sales hit 7.6 million — an 18th consecutive year of growth.
heroAlt: The Life of a Showgirl by Taylor Swift — the best-selling vinyl album in the UK in 2025
